page.title: 05A SCHOOL DAY IN BIRMINGHAM
page.content: ON MONDAY,JUNE 24th.1985,I WOKE VERY UNWILLINGLY,BUT AFTER A WASH I WAS WIDE AWAKE.I GOT UP AT 8.05 AND SO WAS IN A RUSH TO GET READY.I HAD CORNFLAKES FOR BREAKFAST AS I WAS NOT VERY HUNGRY BEFORE WE SET OFF FOR SCHOOL AT 8.40. I ARRIVED AT SCHOOL AT ABOUT 8.50. AFTER REGISTRATION WE HAD ASSEMBLY WHICH I THOUGHT WAS RATHER BORING.THEN WE HAD MATHS WHICH I DID NOT LIKE AS I WAS TOLD OFF BY MRS.SHARPE.AT BREAK I HAD SOMETHING TO EAT AND PLAYED WITH DANNY CARTY.AFTER BREAK WAS P.E. AND WE PLAYED ROUNDERS.MY SIDE WON;6 TO 5. AFTER LUNCH IN THE HALL WE HAD SOME WORK TO PREPARE.FOLLOWING BREAK WE CRAFT UNTIL HOMETIME.I COULD NOT FIND M Y WOODWORK ,SO I HAD TO START AGAIN. WHEN I GOT HOME I WATCHED T.V. AND PLAYED WITH MY BROTHERS.AT 7.30,AT BOYS BRIGADE,WE HAD A TALK ABOUT CAMP.AFTER WATCHING"THE YOUNG ONES"I WENT TO BED.
